name: Golem, Origami
damage_immunities: poison, psychic; nonmagic bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing attacks not made with adamantine weapons
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Lacerating Strike or Wing Buffet attacks.

actions.name: Lacerating Strike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 16 (3d8+3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Wing Buffet (Dragon or Swan Form)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 13 (3d6+3) bludgeoning damage and target must make DC 15 Str save or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Hazardous Hop (Frog Form)
actions.desc: If it jumps 15 ft.+ as part of its move it can then use this to land on its feet in unoccupied space it can see. Each creature within 10 of golem when it lands: 33 (6d10) bludgeoning damage and knocked prone (DC 15 Dex half not prone).

actions.name: Shredded Breath (Dragon Form Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Exhales a spray of paper fragments in a 30' cone. Each creature in area: 31 (9d6) slashing damage and blinded until end of its next turn (DC 15 Dex half not blinded).

actions.name: Trumpeting Blast (Swan Form Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Emits a trumpeting blast in 30' cone. Each creature in area: 31 (7d8) thunder and deafened until end of its next turn (DC 15 Con half not deafened).

bonus_actions.name: Fold
bonus_actions.desc: Reshape papery body to resemble Large dragon Large swan or Med frog. Use again to unfold into Large flat piece of fabric/paper. Stats except size same in each form. Unfolded if it dies.

special_abilities.name: Construct Nature
special_abilities.desc: Doesn't require air food drink or sleep.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance (Unfolded Form)
special_abilities.desc: Motionless indistinguishable from ordinary paper screen tapestry or similar flat paper/fabric art.

special_abilities.name: Standing Leap (Frog Form)
special_abilities.desc: Its long jump is up to 30' and its high jump is up to 15 ft. with or with o a running start.
